abstract: Jenny Morgenthau will step down as executive director of Fresh Air Fund in July, making way for successor Fatima A Shama; organization sends thousands of children from urban neighborhoods in New York City on vacations in country each summer.
lead_paragraph: Jenny Morgenthau is leaving the nonprofit, which sends thousands of New York City children to home stays and programs in suburban and rural areas; Fatima A. Shama will be the next executive director.

headline.main: New Summer, and New Face at Top, for the Fresh Air Fund
headline.print_headline: New Summer, and New Face at Top, for the Fresh Air Fund

snippet: Jenny Morgenthau is leaving the nonprofit, which sends thousands of New York City children to home stays and programs in suburban and rural areas; Fatima A. Shama will be the next executive director.
